column4: is there an alternative way to install mysql when apt-get install mysql-server let's you down by saying the file cannot be found?
best way would be to fix that problem, do you have breezy's main repository enabled?
: no I don't have the main repository enabled ... gonna do that now
ok, there is a wiki page on lamp that might help if you are setting up lamp instead of just mysql, want me to link you?
